original_title: Real Time: Siege at Lucas Street Market
overview: Young armed robbers seeking money for drugs burst into a convenience store, and a simple hold-up escalates into a wholesale homicide!  Assembled entirely from security camera, squad-car cam and news team footage... digitally enhanced... REAL TIME is a unique experiment in non-stop terror that takes YOU inside a hostage crisis.
title: Real Time: Siege at Lucas Street Market
